verbs.description: perfect potato pancakes [ARG0: i] [V: like] [ARG1: to serve these potato pancakes with barbecued sausage] they 're also nice with baked ham and applesauce or with breakfast sausages and with these and other types of meals they 're a good alternative to french fries my children are married and i 'm a widow so i do n't do as much cooking as i once did guests always ask for the recipe when i serve this dish though and when my son and his family visited me from winnipeg not long ago one of the first things he asked for were perfect potato pancakes winnipeg peel potato
